price: Wͻn a wͻyi boniayε na wͻsi (amanfoͻ) kwan firi Nyankopͻn kwan no soͻ no, Yεde asotwee bεka asotwee ho ama wͻn, εnam wͻn nsεmmͻnee a wͻdie no ho nti.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ زِدۡنَٰهُمۡ عَذَابٗا فَوۡقَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يُفۡسِدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi zid'nāhum ʿadhāban fawqa al-ʿadhābi bimā kānū yuf'sidūna
